name: Eye Of The Gods
resist: fire, radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Blazing Nimbus
text: A hostile creature that touches the eye of the gods or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) radiant (good or neutral eyes) or necrotic (evil eyes) damage.

trait.name: Corona Of Truth
text: Allies within 10 feet of the eye of the gods have truesight of 20 feet.

trait.name: Divine Conduit
text: The deity that created the eye of the gods can see everything the eye sees and can instantly recall the eye to its side at any time.

trait.name: Ethereal Jaunt
text: As a bonus action, the eye of the gods can magically shift from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) radiant (good or neutral eyes) or necrotic (evil eyes) damage.

action.name: Divine Inspiration (Recharge 56)
text: The eye of the gods inspires all allies within 10 feet. For 1 minute, all inspired creatures have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
